title: Enter YouTube URL & Transcribe
description: Paste a YouTube video URL to generate an accurate transcript. Only YouTube links are supported — no file uploads required.
reminder: Your transcript is saved in Dashboard → Generate for later summaries, flashcards, and quizzes.

title: Generate Summary
description: Create concise summaries (bullet points, key insights, or detailed explanations) directly from your saved transcript.
reminder: Find all summaries under Dashboard → Generate to quickly review key concepts.

title: Generate Flashcards
description: Convert transcript content into AI‑generated flashcards for active recall and spaced repetition practice.
reminder: Saved flashcards live in Dashboard → Generate → Flashcards for on‑the‑go studying.

title: Generate Quiz & Get Feedback
description: Create AI‑powered quizzes (multiple‑choice and written response) from your transcript. After completing a quiz, receive personalized feedback on strengths and areas for improvement — plus the option to hide or reveal correct answers during self‑study.
reminder: View quiz results, feedback, and answer keys under Dashboard → Generate → Quizzes.
